snippet: Mets starter Jonathon Niese, on the disabled list with a partial tear in his rotator cuff, proclaimed himself ready to go after throwing a pain free minor league rehabilitation start Tuesday.
abstract: Mets starter Jonathon Niese, on the disabled list with a partial tear in his rotator cuff, proclaimed himself ready to go after throwing a pain free minor league rehabilitation start Tuesday.

headline.main: Niese Is Set to Rejoin the Mets' Rotation
